page.title: 11David Sinnet Jones, sailor
page.content: {Mr Sinnet Jones}lives at{Brynglas, {Llangeitho. He does not}farm the land now.A few years ago he had cancer and had a major operation. He decided after recovering that he would like to sail. He built himself a boat.He kept it in the harbour at{Aberaeron. He then amazed everyone by sailing to{South Africa}and back.He thought that he might not sail so far again but then decided that he would build a new ship and sail round the world. So he and a friend started to build two boats at Brynglas.They worked for over two years and then the boats were ready to be taken down to the sea. Mr Sinnet Jones has visited the Llangeitho School to talk to them about his voyage.
